function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Unbalanced class proportions in the dataset","category":"Land Use","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in classifying faces covered by hands, which may lead to inaccurate identification of mask-wearing individuals.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inability to locate people without face masks in densely populated areas due to the limitations of the system.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"System failure when there is a problem in the network, leading to the inability to send information about violators via sms.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Screening for individuals not wearing facial masks","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overfitting in the training data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fluctuating testing loss and decrease in prediction confidence","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of images from different sources","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on convolutional neural network cnn architecture","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overfitting in the neural network","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of driverless vehicles for monitoring scenarios across the city","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of insufficiently fitted face masks","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate detection and prediction of disease spread in urban areas","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on facial recognition technology for mask detection","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of deep learning techniques in object detection for face mask monitoring.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor activities are closely related to virus spreading risk","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of private space in homes during pandemic","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality in homes","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate solid-waste management in homes","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality due to limited ventilation and recirculation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 spread indoors","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus droplets staying in the air","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact surface contamination","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate building design for fighting airborne viruses and maintaining healthy conditions for occupants during quarantine and stay-at-home orders.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and wastewater management in residential buildings, leading to the potential spread of viruses through sewage.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate bathroom infrastructure in residential buildings for preventing virus transmission between occupants during quarantine.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation leading to increased transmission of viruses","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate distancing measures leading to higher risk of virus transmission","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene facilities leading to poor sanitation and disease spread","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral transmission in buildings and transportation","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental contamination in hospitals","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in building activities and layouts due to covid-19","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus transmission in crowded and poorly ventilated rooms","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate building design for preventing virus spread","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges for public transport systems","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in the housing market","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases in residential care facilities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly designed and resourced housing exacerbating the spread of the virus","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital infrastructure may lead to cyber security vulnerabilities and data privacy risks.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid development of digital twins and iot integration may lead to technical errors and malfunctions.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for digitalisation to compromise personal data privacy in water utilities","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need to re-imagine water systems and infrastructure to address climate change and potential outbreaks","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Energy requirements and potential for counterbalancing savings in water systems digitalization","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate data from iot-powered assets due to sensor fouling, drift, lack of maintenance, or calibration","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased personnel density in centralised infrastructure management","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of redundancy in centralised infrastructure","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient collection of invoices and economic resources for water utility","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital solutions and smart technology for water infrastructure","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Predictive maintenance and remote monitoring using digital twins","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased automation and real-time remote control of critical water infrastructure","category":"Water","confidence":"High"}]}
